thread.title: These Are Set to Be the Most Popular Unisex Baby Names in 2017
thread.title_full: These Are Set to Be the Most Popular Unisex Baby Names in 2017

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: These Are Set to Be the Most Popular Unisex Baby Names in 2017
text:
In a world where gender can be divisive, many parents-to-be are considering going down the gender neutral route, with a name that doesn't necessarily scream 'male' or 'female.'
And with that in mind, baby name site Nameberry listed some of the unisex names that are likely to increase in popularity this year. To work these out, the site measured which names got the most page views in the first month of 2017 compared to last January, and measured the trends from there.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Here's what they came up with...
Quincy Remi Winter Ellis Briar Indigo Sage Sasha Ray Those are good names, right? Right! BRB, off to have nine babies so I can name them after this list.
